T02TD2463E:138a-1: shr'i bandha bi mukta sh'a stra /
T02TD2463E:138a-3: dpal 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos /
T02TD2463E:138b-0: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal @138b lo //
T02TD2463E:138b-1: gang zhig ma rtogs rtogs dka' rtogs na de nyid dus //
T02TD2463E:138b-2: 'ching ba mi bzad shin tu grol dka' grol 'gyur ba //
T02TD2463E:138b-3: bdag dang gzhan don phun tshogs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lam //
T02TD2463E:138b-4: ngo mtshar de ni 'gro ba bsgral phyir bdag gis bshad //
T02TD2463E:138b-5: gyad kyi nor bu la sogs bzhin //
T02TD2463E:138b-6: snying po de ni gzhan min gnas //
T02TD2463E:138b-7: gang phyir thams cad rang gis rang //
T02TD2463E:138b-10: 'ching ba gang yin de grol ba'o //
T02TD2463E:138b-11: de ni stong dang rten 'brel 'jug / de phyir phongs pas mi rtogs so //
T02TD2463E:138b-12: dman dang log pa'i bshes gnyen gyis //
T02TD2463E:138b-13: zin gyur bsod nams brtson 'grus zhen //
T02TD2463E:138b-14: sbyangs stobs blo gros chung ba yi //
T02TD2463E:138b-15: skye bo rnams kyis rtogs dka'o //
T02TD2463E:138b-16: rtogs ldan snying brtse man ngag mkhas //
T02TD2463E:138b-17: bshes gnyen dam ba btsal bar bya //
T02TD2463E:138b-18: de ni srog lus longs spyod sogs //
T02TD2463E:138b-19: rnam kun dri med gus pas bsten //
T02TD2463E:138b-20: ji srid bdag sems brtan gyur pa //
T02TD2463E:138b-21: de srid lus dang grib ma bzhin //
T02TD2463E:138b-22: de yi rjes su bstan pa ni //
T02TD2463E:138b-23: rten 'brel stong nyid bdud rtsi'i chu //
T02TD2463E:138b-24: skom pas gdungs la chu bsil bzhin //
T02TD2463E:138b-25: dga' mgu mi zad dang bas btung //
T02TD2463E:138b-26: la ma gzhan phun tshogs nges 'byung min //
T02TD2463E:138b-27: de shes thabs dang shes rab yin //
T02TD2463E:138b-28: de ni chos sgo kun gyi sgo //
T02TD2463E:138b-29: rtogs dka' rtogs byed dam pa'i lam //
T02TD2463E:138b-30: ji ltar rten 'brel tsam nyid phyir //
T02TD2463E:138b-31: de ni ji ltar stong ma yin //
T02TD2463E:138b-32: gang phyir stong pa nyid yin na //
T02TD2463E:138b-33: de ni mkha' ltar 'gag med phyir //
T02TD2463E:138b-35: de phyir de gnyis gnyis ma yin //
T02TD2463E:138b-36: de la rten 'brel ji lta bu //
T02TD2463E:138b-37: de yi stong nyid gang zhe na //
T02TD2463E:138b-38: nyon cig 'di ltar snang ba'i dngos //
T02TD2463E:138b-39: dbang po'i gzhu ltar rab gsal ba //
T02TD2463E:138b-40: sna tshogs bde dang sdug bsngal sogs //
T02TD2463E:138b-42: rgyu gzhan ma yin ma nges min //
T02TD2463E:138b-43: mngar skyur kha la rang rgyu yin //
T02TD2463E:138b-45: ji ltar mkha' la sprin bzhin no //
T02TD2463E:138b-46: kye ma srid pa'i nags tshal du //
T02TD2463E:138b-47: sdug bsngal lo 'bras cher lhags shing //
T02TD2463E:138b-48: nyes par spyad pa'i yal ga can //
T02TD2463E:139a-2: de rgyu chags sdang tshul min sdong //
T02TD2463E:139a-3: bdag tu lta ba'i rtsa brtan te //
T02TD2463E:139a-4: mi shes bag chags bcas drod gsher //
T02TD2463E:139a-5: sa chen 'byung ba las bskyed ba'o //
T02TD2463E:139a-6: mkha' la snod kyi 'jig rten ltar //
T02TD2463E:139a-7: ae ma'o rten med rten gyur pa //
T02TD2463E:139a-8: rten 'brel brtan pa rnams kyi mchog / re zhig rten ni ma grub na //
T02TD2463E:139a-9: brten pa ji ltar rnam gzhag rung //
T02TD2463E:139a-10: bdag med de lta bden min na //
T02TD2463E:139a-11: des bskyed chags sogs las rnams sogs //
T02TD2463E:139a-12: gang du ji ltar nges par bya //
T02TD2463E:139a-13: de ma grub na sdug bsngal gang //
T02TD2463E:139a-14: de myong nyid kyang su zhig brjod //
T02TD2463E:139a-15: ji ltar sdong po'i rtsa phyung na //
T02TD2463E:139a-16: bcad pa'i bya ba grub pa ltar //
T02TD2463E:139a-17: gzhir gyur bdag rtogs rnams bzlog pas //
T02TD2463E:139a-18: mkhas pa de bzhin srid pa gzhig / bsregs bcad bdar bas gser sogs bzhin //
T02TD2463E:139a-19: 'di ltar bdag dang gzhan ba zhes //
T02TD2463E:139a-20: bya ba ji ltar rten dang gnas //
T02TD2463E:139a-21: ngo bo mtshan nyid brtag par byos //
T02TD2463E:139a-22: de la lus dag rlung dang yid //
T02TD2463E:139a-23: phyi nang bar sogs 'di dag ni //
T02TD2463E:139a-24: nam yang rten byed gnas gyur pa //
T02TD2463E:139a-25: sus kyang nges par mi nus so //
T02TD2463E:139a-26: gang phyir bdag de snang rung na //
T02TD2463E:139a-27: dmigs gyur dmigs pa med pa'i phyir //
T02TD2463E:139a-28: mi snang sems dang sems min smos //
T02TD2463E:139a-29: sems ni rang bzhin stong bdag nyid //
T02TD2463E:139a-30: sems min mi rtag rten 'brel bdag / rnam par dpyad na spros med do //
T02TD2463E:139a-31: rtag la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir //
T02TD2463E:139a-32: gang na ci 'dra bdag bstan byos //
T02TD2463E:139a-33: mdor na 'dir mang smra mi bya //
T02TD2463E:139a-34: bdag de rang gi sgo gsum las //
T02TD2463E:139a-35: gzhan na 'dir snod ci zhig byas //
T02TD2463E:139a-36: mtshon gyi rma ltar nyes pa yang //
T02TD2463E:139a-37: byis pa rnams kyi rang rtags dang //
T02TD2463E:139a-38: log sred skye bo'i rtsod par zad //
T02TD2463E:139a-39: gzhan min de dag rnam dpyad na //
T02TD2463E:139a-40: ji ltar gang zhig bdag tu 'gyur //
T02TD2463E:139a-41: de min de rten de gnas gang //
T02TD2463E:139a-42: gang yang 'di dag de rten dang //
T02TD2463E:139a-43: de gnas phyogs kyang rnam dpyad kyi //
T02TD2463E:139a-44: tshul 'dis bdag dngos bdag mtshan nyid //
T02TD2463E:139a-45: sgyu ltar legs grub bstan pa yin //
T02TD2463E:139a-47: ngag ni brag ca mkha' 'dra yid //
T02TD2463E:139a-48: rdul tsam dmigs pa yod min na //
T02TD2463E:139b-0: 'di la ji ltar bdag tu brtag / phyi ni phyi @139b rol nang yang gzhan //
T02TD2463E:139b-1: des na bar yang de dag min //
T02TD2463E:139b-2: gang yang de ni dkar sogs min //
T02TD2463E:139b-3: ring dang thung dang sbom dang phra //
T02TD2463E:139b-4: mthug dang srab ces bya la sogs //
T02TD2463E:139b-5: mtshan nyid nges par nus ma yin //
T02TD2463E:139b-6: ci ste shing la 'khril shing bzhin //
T02TD2463E:139b-7: de ni kun gzhi 'am bag chags la //
T02TD2463E:139b-8: brten te mi mngon gnas she na //
T02TD2463E:139b-9: snang dang mi snang rnam dpyad dang //
T02TD2463E:139b-10: de nyid sems dang sems min zhes //
T02TD2463E:139b-11: sngar bzhin brtag pa mtshungs par 'gyur //
T02TD2463E:139b-12: 'on te sems ni gang yin pa //
T02TD2463E:139b-13: de nyid bdag ces bya zhe na //
T02TD2463E:139b-14: sems ni dmigs med 'od gsal phyir //
T02TD2463E:139b-15: da ni bdag de bdag med 'gyur //
T02TD2463E:139b-16: ae ma'o shin tu rtogs dka'i gnas //
T02TD2463E:139b-17: ae ma'o ae ma shin tu rmad //
T02TD2463E:139b-18: ae ma'o mkhas pas shes par rung //
T02TD2463E:139b-19: ae ma'o shes bral shes pa'i dbyings //
T02TD2463E:139b-20: de ltar 'gro pa 'di na bdag / med kyang nga dang nga yi zhes //
T02TD2463E:139b-21: gzung dang 'dzin pas brlabs pa yi //
T02TD2463E:139b-22: skye bo smyos pa 'di dag ci //
T02TD2463E:139b-23: 'on kyang 'jig rten log pas mig / bsgribs nas gzung dang 'dzin pa ni //
T02TD2463E:139b-24: ji ltar snang ba ji bzhin bzhag / snang la snang ltar rab chags srid //
T02TD2463E:139b-25: sdug bsngal 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyu //
T02TD2463E:139b-26: bdag cag de las 'da' min nam //
T02TD2463E:139b-27: gal te bdag nyid ma grub kyang//
T02TD2463E:139b-28: de 'dzin nyid du bden zhe na //
T02TD2463E:139b-30: log par 'ching ba mi bzad pas //
T02TD2463E:139b-31: mgo la me shor bsgrims pa bzhin //
T02TD2463E:139b-32: rings par myur du ldog par bya //
T02TD2463E:139b-33: grogs dag 'di ltar mngon sum du //
T02TD2463E:139b-34: yang dag rig pa'i mig nyid kyis //
T02TD2463E:139b-35: bdag de ma grub des na 'dir //
T02TD2463E:139b-36: gzhan zhes bya ba'ang yod min na //
T02TD2463E:139b-37: yu bu thams cad snyam dang //
T02TD2463E:139b-38: nga'o snyam dang gzhan snyam dang //
T02TD2463E:139b-39: gzhan gyi'o zhes log rtog pa //
T02TD2463E:139b-40: 'di dag ji ltar gang du dogs //
T02TD2463E:139b-41: dper na rmi lam bu shi ba //
T02TD2463E:139b-42: bu nyid med na de shi yang //
T02TD2463E:139b-43: bden par yod pa ma yin pa //
T02TD2463E:139b-44: de bzhin yu bu'i 'dzin pa yang //
T02TD2463E:139b-45: ae ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar gnas //
T02TD2463E:139b-46: gang zhig gcig nyid rtogs pa yis //
T02TD2463E:139b-47: thams cad rnam par grol 'gyur ba //
T02TD2463E:139b-48: 'di la the tshom su zhig skrag /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos //
T02TD2463E:139b-49: phung po khams dang skye mched sogs //
T02TD2463E:140a-2: ma lus bdag min bdag gis min //
T02TD2463E:140a-3: bdag med stong pa'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2463E:140a-4: med phyir med la med nyid du //
T02TD2463E:140a-5: tshul bzhin nges par byas pa la //
T02TD2463E:140a-6: kye ma khyod la skyon ci yod //
T02TD2463E:140a-7: gang gang bdag dang bdag gi zhes //
T02TD2463E:140a-9: phyi min nang min par yang min //
T02TD2463E:140a-10: de bzhin lus ngag yod ma yin //
T02TD2463E:140a-11: de dag las min der gnas min //
T02TD2463E:140a-12: de bzhin chags dang sdang sogs kyi //
T02TD2463E:140a-13: ma lus yid la byed pa yang //
T02TD2463E:140a-14: dpyad na re zhig gang la gang //
T02TD2463E:140a-15: gang du gang gis chags pa dang //
T02TD2463E:140a-17: gzugs sdug sgra snyan dri zhim dang //
T02TD2463E:140a-18: ro mngar reg 'jam yid bde'i rkyen //
T02TD2463E:140a-19: 'di dag gang gis de shes la //
T02TD2463E:140a-20: ci zhig phan btags 'brel ba yod //
T02TD2463E:140a-21: de shes pas kyang de dag la //
T02TD2463E:140a-22: chags dang rab tu chags 'gyur gang //
T02TD2463E:140a-23: de ni phyi nang bar dag dang ;
T02TD2463E:140a-24: / lus sogs dngos po gang zhig yin //
T02TD2463E:140a-25: de min de la de brten dang //
T02TD2463E:140a-27: sgyu ma yi ni rta glang ltar //
T02TD2463E:140a-28: don du grub pa yod ma yin //
T02TD2463E:140a-29: gang gis bdag la brnyas sogs dang //
T02TD2463E:140a-30: smad sogs brdeg sogs byas pa'i rgyu //
T02TD2463E:140a-31: sdang dang rab sdang sems 'byung ba //
T02TD2463E:140a-32: 'di yang sngar bzhin bdag sems dang //
T02TD2463E:140a-33: gang yang pha rol de yi sems //
T02TD2463E:140a-34: mkha' 'dra mtshan ma med pa yin //
T02TD2463E:140a-35: de bzhin gzhan de'i ngag nyid dang //
T02TD2463E:140a-36: lus ni dri sgra shing lta bu //
T02TD2463E:140a-37: yin na sgyu mas sgyu ma yi //
T02TD2463E:140a-38: rgyal ltar des 'dir bdag gnod gang //
T02TD2463E:140a-39: bdag gi'ang de bzhin ngag dang lus //
T02TD2463E:140a-40: de ltar lus can thams cad kyi'ang //
T02TD2463E:140a-41: mtshungs phyir 'di dag skye ba dang //
T02TD2463E:140a-43: gang phyir phan tshun 'brel med phyir //
T02TD2463E:140a-44: dpyad na thams cad spros med phyir //
T02TD2463E:140a-45: yul dus rnam kun dri med phyir //
T02TD2463E:140a-46: mkha' la 'phur ba'i bya rjes bzhin //
T02TD2463E:140a-47: de ltar stod pa'i spyod yul 'dir //
T02TD2463E:140a-48: rmi lam sgra dang 'ja' bzhin du //
T02TD2463E:140a-49: gang la gang zhig ji ltar chags //
T02TD2463E:140a-50: de bzhin sdang ba 'ang gang du dogs //
T02TD2463E:140a-51: pha dang ma dang chung ma bu //
T02TD2463E:140a-52: gnyen dang bshes pa de bzhin dgra //
T02TD2463E:140b-0: @140b sgyu ma ji bzhin de bzhin pas //
T02TD2463E:140b-1: 'dzin pa thams cad gzhig par bya //
T02TD2463E:140b-2: de nyid kyis na chags sogs kyis //
T02TD2463E:140b-3: las byed de yang ji lta bu //
T02TD2463E:140b-4: yang yang shes rab brtan po yis //
T02TD2463E:140b-5: mkhas pas sngar bzhin brtag par byos //
T02TD2463E:140b-6: de phyir bde dang sdug bsngal yang //
T02TD2463E:140b-7: bems pos rnam par myong min la //
T02TD2463E:140b-8: rig la dngos po yod min te //
T02TD2463E:140b-9: thog med dus nas log sbyangs pa //
T02TD2463E:140b-11: de yang dngos po med pa nyid //
T02TD2463E:140b-12: de ltar med la med nyid du //
T02TD2463E:140b-13: blo bzang rnams kyis goms byas na //
T02TD2463E:140b-14: smyos bas gnyen la dgra bzhin du //
T02TD2463E:140b-15: mi bzad 'ching bas bcings pa de //
T02TD2463E:140b-16: sprul mdud rang gis 'grol ba bzhin //
T02TD2463E:140b-17: nges par rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2463E:140b-18: rnam grol rnam grol las byung ba'i //
T02TD2463E:140b-19: 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa gang //
T02TD2463E:140b-20: don gnyis phan tshogs ngo mtshar ba //
T02TD2463E:140b-21: de ni bum pa bzang po bzhin //
T02TD2463E:140b-22: dpal 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po grub pa brnyes pa'i dpal ni skal langkas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2463E:140b-24: // / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shr'i dza ga ta mi tr'a nanda'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD2463E:140b-25: kha che'i pandi ta chen po buddh'a shr'i bha dras gtan la pab nas bod kyi lo chung gnubs tshul khrims shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
